title: Design of Remote Education-Based Elementary Science Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners Primarily Access Content via Smartphones During Non-Work Hours, with Peer Feedback and Tutor Support Provided During Project Execution

learning_goals: Learners can independently design 5 science project topics (e.g., plant growth experiments, simple physics experiments) in remote environments.
Learners can collaborate with peers and share project deliverables using mobile devices.
Learners can achieve over 80% in summative assessments by applying the scientific inquiry process (e.g., hypothesis formulation → experimentation → analysis → conclusion).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
